summary: The module provides data structures that encapsulate batches of graph elements—edges and nodes—along with their identifiers, types, feature tensors, and optional message tensors, offering convenient accessors for size, type, and underlying data.
business_intent: Enable user‑defined graph functions to operate efficiently on groups of edges or nodes by supplying ready‑made batch containers that manage feature and message data, simplifying feature extraction and message‑passing logic in DGL workloads.
